testcase.classname: user should be able to register to the system
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration page...................................passed When user choose his gender.................................................passed And user enter his First name, Last name and email.........................passed And user enter his Date of birth............................................passed And user enter his company name.............................................passed And user enter a password and confirm password..............................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user registration completed successfully...............................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter "mohammed56@yahoo.com" and "123456".........................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed

testcase.name: user forget password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the login page......................................passed When user click on forget password..........................................passed And user go to reset password page..........................................passed And user enter his email and click recover button..........................passed Then user get a recover mail successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the home page.......................................passed When user enter a product name in search box................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then user find the product..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies
testcase.name: user could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user click on currencies section.......................................passed And user choose the US Dollar currency......................................passed Then the Dollar currency applied to the products............................passed When user click on currencies section1......................................passed And user choose the Euro currency...........................................passed Then the Euro currency applied to the products..............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user opens home page..................................................passed When user click on a category...............................................passed Then Electronics page opened................................................passed And a list of sub-categories is displayed...................................passed When user click on a sub-category...........................................passed Then the page of this sub-category is opened................................passed And sub-category components ar displayed....................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given user open shoes category page.........................................passed When user choose a color....................................................passed Then categories with the choosen color displayed............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given user go to categories page............................................passed When user click on a tag....................................................passed Then a list of products of the selected tag displayed.......................passed When user click on another tag..............................................passed Then a list of products of the new selected tag displayed...................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user open home page...................................................passed When user choose a product..................................................passed And user add the product to the shopping cart...............................passed And user choose another product and add it to shopping cart.................passed Then the selected products are found in the shopping cart...................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user open the home page...............................................passed When user choose the product................................................passed And user add the product to the wishlist....................................passed And user choose another product and add it to wishlist......................passed Then the selected products are found in the wishlist........................passed

testcase.name: user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user visit home page..................................................passed When user choose product....................................................passed And user add the product to the compare list................................passed And user choose another product and add it to compare list..................passed Then the selected products are found in the compare list....................passed

testcase.name: Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user could login successfully..........................................passed And user add a product to the shopping cart.................................passed And go to shopping cart.....................................................passed And user accept terms of service and press checkout.........................passed And user fill his data to address and continue..............................passed And user choose shipping method.............................................passed And user choose payment method and continue.................................passed And user confirm order......................................................passed Then order completed........................................................passed
